name: Amazon S3
description: The Amazon S3 connector allows you to access the Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3), which provides a simple web services interface that can be used to store and retrieve any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It gives any developer access to the same highly scalable, reliable, secure, fast, inexpensive infrastructure that Amazon S3 uses to run its own global network of websites. The connector with WSO2 EI enables you to publish and manage your enterprise data at Amazon S3 service.

operations.name: createBucket
operations.description: Get details about payments that have not completed

operations.name: deleteBucket
operations.description: Deletes the bucket named in the URI. All objects (including all object versions and Delete Markers) in the bucket must be deleted before the bucket itself can be deleted

operations.name: deleteBucketCORS
operations.description: Deletes the CORS configuration information set for the bucket

operations.name: deleteBucketLifecycle
operations.description: Deletes the lifecycle configuration from the specified bucket

operations.name: deleteBucketPolicy
operations.description: Delete the policy on a specified bucket

operations.name: deleteBucketReplication
operations.description: Deletes the replication subresource associated with the specified bucket

operations.name: deleteBucketTagging
operations.description: Removes a tags set from the specified bucket

operations.name: deleteBucketWebsiteConfiguration
operations.description: Removes the website configuration for a bucket

operations.name: getBucketACL
operations.description: Return the access control list (ACL) of a bucket

operations.name: getBucketCORS
operations.description: Returns the CORS configuration information set for the bucket

operations.name: getBucketLifecycleConfiguration
operations.description: Returns the lifecycle configuration information set on the bucket

operations.name: getBucketLocation
operations.description: Returns a bucket's region

operations.name: getBucketLogging
operations.description: Returns the logging storageClass of a bucket

operations.name: getBucketNotificationConfiguration
operations.description: Returns the notification configuration of a bucket

operations.name: getBucketPolicy
operations.description: Return the policy of a specified bucket

operations.name: getBucketReplication
operations.description: Returns replication configuration information set on the bucket

operations.name: getBucketRequestPayment
operations.description: Return the request payment configuration of a bucket

operations.name: getBucketTagging
operations.description: Returns the tags set associated with the bucket

operations.name: getBucketVersioning
operations.description: Returns the versioning state of a bucket

operations.name: getBucketWebsite
operations.description: Returns the website configuration associated with a bucket

operations.name: headBucket
operations.description: To determine if a bucket exists and you have permission to access it

operations.name: listBuckets
operations.description: Return the request payment configuration of a bucket.

operations.name: listMultipartUploads
operations.description: Lists in-progress multipart uploads

operations.name: listObjects
operations.description: Returns some or all (up to 1000) of the objects in a bucket

operations.name: listObjectVersions
operations.description: List metadata about all of the versions of objects in a bucket

operations.name: putBucketACL
operations.description: Set the permissions on an existing bucket using access control lists

operations.name: putBucketCORS
operations.description: Sets the CORS configuration for your bucket

operations.name: putBucketLifecycleConfiguration
operations.description: Creates a new lifecycle configuration for the bucket or replaces an existing lifecycle configuration

operations.name: putBucketPolicy
operations.description: Add to or replace a policy on a bucket

operations.name: putBucketReplication
operations.description: Creates a new replication configuration

operations.name: putBucketRequestPayment
operations.description: Set the request payment configuration of a bucket

operations.name: putBucketTagging
operations.description: Adds a set of tags to an existing bucket

operations.name: putBucketVersioning
operations.description: Set the versioning state of an existing bucket

operations.name: putBucketWebsite
operations.description: Sets the configuration of the website that is specified in the website subresource

operations.name: init
operations.description: Configuration files.

operations.name: abortMultipartUpload
operations.description: Abort a currently active multipart upload

operations.name: copyBucketObject
operations.description: Creates a copy of an object that is already stored in Amazon S3

operations.name: deleteObject
operations.description: Removes the null version (if there is one) of an object and inserts a delete marker, which becomes the latest version of the object

operations.name: deleteObjects
operations.description: Delete multiple objects from a bucket using a single HTTP request

operations.name: getObject
operations.description: Retrieves objects from Amazon S3

operations.name: getObjectACL
operations.description: Returns the access control list (ACL) of an object

operations.name: getObjectTagging
operations.description: Retrieve the list of tags associated with the object

operations.name: getObjectTorrent
operations.description: Returns torrent files from a bucket

operations.name: headObject
operations.description: Retrieves metadata from an object without returning the object itself

operations.name: completeMultipartUpload
operations.description: Complete the multipart upload

operations.name: createMultipartUpload
operations.description: Create a multipart upload for Part uploads

operations.name: listParts
operations.description: Retrieve list of uploaded parts

operations.name: multipartUpload
operations.description: Complete a currently active multipart upload

operations.name: putObject
operations.description: Create objects from Amazon S3 bucket

operations.name: putObjectAcl
operations.description: Set the access control list (ACL) permissions for an object that already exists in a bucket

operations.name: restoreObject
operations.description: Restores a temporary copy of an archived object

operations.name: uploadPart
operations.description: Upload a tag for a current multipart upload

operations.name: uploadPartCopy
operations.description: Uploads a tag by copying data from an existing object as data source

operations.name: generatePutObjectPresignedUrl
operations.description: Generate a presigned URL to upload an object to Amazon S3

operations.name: generateGetObjectPresignedUrl
operations.description: Generate a presigned URL to download an object from Amazon S3

connections.name: amazons3
connections.description: Connection for accessing Amazon S3 storage.
